title:
DEIB Self-Evaluation
Please take a few moments to complete a self-evaluation on your comfort level with understanding and implementing the foundations of the DEIB course. This will help you identify areas for future growth.

Scale: 1 = Strongly Disagree | 2 = Disagree | 3 = Neutral | 4 = Agree | 5 = Strongly Agree
